Starting test: tc03VerifyUserCanSendMessage tc03VerifyUserCanSendMessage: Verify users can type and send messages through the input box Clicked on Login Using Credential Logged into U-Ask as (farrukh.mohsin@northbaysolutions.net/test) Entered 'How can I apply for a new Emirates ID card?' in chat input box Clicked 'Send' button Latest AI response: Step-by-Step Guide: Applying for a New Emirates ID Card Applying for a new Emirates ID card is a mandatory process for all UAE citizens and residents. Below is a clear, step-by-step guide to help you through the application process: 1. Prepare Required Documents The documents you need may vary depending on your nationality and age, but generally include: Valid passport (original and copy) Valid UAE residence visa (for expatriates) Birth certificate (for children) Passport-sized photograph (recent, with white background) Supporting documents for special categories (e.g., divorce certificate for single mothers, etc.) 1 2. Choose Your Application Method You can apply for a new Emirates ID card through one of the following ways: Online via the official ICP (Federal Authority for Identity, Citizenship, Customs and Ports Security) website Through the ICP mobile app (available on Google Play, App Store, and Huawei) At an accredited typing centre 2 3. Fill Out the Application Form Complete the Emirates ID application form with accurate personal details. If applying online, follow the prompts on the ICP website or app. If using a typing centre, staff will assist you in filling out the form 2 . 4. Pay the Applicable Fees Pay the required fees for the Emirates ID issuance. The fee structure may vary based on the validity period and service channel (online or typing centre). Keep the payment receipt for your records 2 . 5. Biometric Data Collection You may be required to visit an ICP Customer Happiness Centre to provide your biometric data (fingerprints, photograph, etc.), especially if this is your first Emirates ID or if you are a child above a certain age. You will be notified if this step is necessary after submitting your application 2 . 6. Track Your Application After submitting your application, you can track its status online through the ICP website or app. You will receive SMS updates regarding the progress of your application and when your Emirates ID is ready for collection 1 . 7. Collect Your Emirates ID Card Once your Emirates ID is ready, you will receive a notification (usually via SMS). Collect your card from the designated Emirates Post office or ICP centre as instructed in the notification 2 . Additional Notes The Emirates ID is a legal requirement for all UAE citizens and residents, including newborn babies. The card is essential for accessing government services, opening bank accounts, signing leases, and more. There is an urgent service (“Fawri”) available for UAE and GCC nationals, allowing issuance within 24 hours for an additional fee 2 . For more information or assistance, you can contact the ICP Call Centre at 6005 30003 or use the virtual assistant “Hamad” on the ICP website 2 . References 1 : Emirates ID Requirements & Application Process – Shuraa 2 : Official UAE Government Portal: Emirates ID Application Process If you need more details about specific document requirements or have a unique situation (such as applying for a child or urgent processing), please let me know! Sources Keyword match similarity: 0.8205128205128205 User can send messages via input box
Question: How can I apply for a new Emirates ID card?

Clicked on Login Using Credential Logged into U-Ask as (farrukh.mohsin@northbaysolutions.net/test) Entered 'Where can I renew my residence visa in Dubai?' in chat input box Clicked 'Send' button Latest AI response: You can renew your residence visa in Dubai through several official channels: Online Platforms: GDRFA Dubai Website: You can apply for renewal directly on the General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs (GDRFA) Dubai website 1 . GDRFA Dubai Smart App: Available for both iOS and Android devices 1 . DubaiNow App: Another official app offering visa renewal services 1 . In-Person Service Centers: Amer Centers: These government-authorized centers are located throughout Dubai and provide comprehensive visa renewal services. You can visit any Amer Center for assistance 2 3 . When renewing your residence visa, you may also need to complete a medical fitness test at an approved medical center. Several centers in Dubai, such as Al Nahda Center, Salah El Deen Center, Ibn Battuta Center, Dragon Mart 2 Center, Al Baraha Smart Center, and Al Refaa Center, are authorized for this purpose 4 . For the most efficient experience, many residents choose to start the process online and visit an Amer Center only if required. References: 1 : GDRFA Dubai – Residency Visa Renewal Channels 2 : Amer 24/7 Government Transaction Center 3 : Amer Centre – Residency Renewal Services 4 : EHS – Medical Fitness Centers in Dubai Sources User can see AI-generated responses are displayed correctly.

Starting test: tc05VerifyMultilingualSupport tc05VerifyMultilingualSupport: Verify that AI-generated responses are displayed correctly. Clicked on Login Using Credential Logged into U-Ask as (farrukh.mohsin@northbaysolutions.net/test) Entered 'Where can I renew my residence visa in Dubai?' in chat input box Clicked 'Send' button Latest AI response: Where to Renew Your Residence Visa in Dubai You can renew your Dubai residence visa through several official channels. Here are your main options: 1. Online Platforms GDRFA Dubai Website: You can apply for renewal directly through the General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs (GDRFA) Dubai official website 1 . GDRFA Dubai Smart App: Download the GDRFADUBAI app on your smartphone to complete the process digitally 2 . DubaiNow App: This app also allows you to renew your residency visa online 2 . 2. In-Person Service Centers Amer Centers: These are authorized government service centers located throughout Dubai. You can visit any Amer Center to renew your residence visa. Some Amer Centers, such as Amer247 in Deira, operate 24 hours a day for your convenience 3 4 . Summary Table Channel How to Access Notes GDRFA Website https://www.gdrfad.gov.ae Online application GDRFA Smart App Download from app stores Online application DubaiNow App Download from app stores Online application Amer Centers Visit any Amer Center in Dubai In-person, some open 24/7 Additional Tips Prepare all required documents before starting the renewal process (passport, Emirates ID, medical test results, etc.) 5 . For personalized assistance, Amer Centers have staff who can guide you through the process. References 1 : GDRFA Dubai – Official Website 2 : GDRFA Dubai – Residency Renewal Channels 3 : Amer247 – 24/7 Amer Center in Deira 4 : Amer Centre Karama – Residency Renewal Services 5 : DAMAC – UAE Residence Visa Renewal Guide Sources User can see AI-generated responses are displayed correctly. User can able see LTR (English) response Entered 'أين يمكنني دفع فاتورة الكهرباء الخاصة بي؟' in chat input box Clicked 'Send' button Latest AI response: طرق دفع فاتورة الكهرباء في أبوظبي يمكنك دفع فاتورة الكهرباء الخاصة بك في إمارة أبوظبي عبر عدة قنوات رسمية وموثوقة، تتيح لك سهولة وسرعة في السداد. فيما يلي أبرز الطرق المتاحة: 1. الدفع الإلكتروني عبر الإنترنت من خلال الموقع الرسمي لشركة أبوظبي للتوزيع (ADDC): يمكنك تسجيل الدخول باستخدام رقم الحساب أو الهوية الإماراتية ودفع الفاتورة مباشرة عبر الموقع الإلكتروني 1 2 . عبر تطبيق الهاتف الذكي الخاص بشركة أبوظبي للتوزيع، والمتوفر على أجهزة أندرويد وآيفون 2 . 2. الدفع التلقائي (الخصم المباشر) يمكنك تفعيل خدمة الخصم التلقائي من حسابك البنكي بحيث يتم خصم قيمة الفاتورة شهريًا بشكل تلقائي. يتم التسجيل لهذه الخدمة عبر الموقع الإلكتروني أو التطبيق أو من خلال البنك الشريك 2 . 3. الدفع عبر مراكز خدمة العملاء زيارة أحد فروع شركة أبوظبي للتوزيع المنتشرة في أنحاء الإمارة، حيث يمكنك دفع الفاتورة نقدًا أو عبر بطاقات الدفع 2 . 4. الدفع عبر محلات الصرافة والسوبرماركت يمكنك دفع الفاتورة في بعض محلات الصرافة المعتمدة (مثل لولو للصرافة، الأنصاري للصرافة، لاري للصرافة، الفردان للصرافة) أو في بعض السوبرماركت المرتبطة بالخدمة 2 . 5. بوابة حكومة أبوظبي الرقمية (تم) يمكنك دفع الفاتورة من خلال بوابة "تم" الإلكترونية، والتي تتيح خدمات دفع الفواتير الحكومية بسهولة 1 . 6. الهاتف أو مركز الاتصال الاتصال بمركز خدمة العملاء على الرقم 8002332 واتباع التعليمات لدفع الفاتورة عبر الهاتف باستخدام بطاقة الائتمان 2 . ملخص سريع (جدول) طريقة الدفع القناة/الموقع ملاحظات الموقع الإلكتروني www.addc.ae دفع مباشر عبر الإنترنت تطبيق الهاتف الذكي تطبيق ADDC متوفر على أندرويد وآيفون الخصم التلقائي البنكي عبر البنك أو الموقع يتطلب تفعيل مسبق مراكز خدمة العملاء فروع شركة أبوظبي للتوزيع دفع نقدي أو بالبطاقة محلات الصرافة والسوبرماركت لولو، الأنصاري، لاري... دفع نقدي بوابة تم tamm.abudhabi خدمات حك User can see AI-generated responses are displayed correctly. 12:25:45.752 [TestNG-tests-1] ERROR utils.Log - User not able see to RTL (Arabic) response User not able see to RTL (Arabic) response

2025-10-05 12:25:45أين يمكنني دفع فاتورة الكهرباء الخاصة بي؟يمكنك دفع فاتورة الكهرباء الخاصة بك عبر موقع هيئة الكهرباء والمياه باستخدام بطاقة الدفع أو الحساب البنكي.طرق دفع فاتورة الكهرباء في أبوظبي
يمكنك دفع فاتورة الكهرباء الخاصة بك في إمارة أبوظبي عبر عدة قنوات رسمية وموثوقة، تتيح لك سهولة وسرعة في السداد. فيما يلي أبرز الطرق المتاحة:
1. الدفع الإلكتروني عبر الإنترنت
من خلال الموقع الرسمي لشركة أبوظبي للتوزيع (ADDC): يمكنك تسجيل الدخول باستخدام رقم الحساب أو الهوية الإماراتية ودفع الفاتورة مباشرة عبر الموقع الإلكتروني
1
2
.
عبر تطبيق الهاتف الذكي الخاص بشركة أبوظبي للتوزيع، والمتوفر على أجهزة أندرويد وآيفون
2
.
2. الدفع التلقائي (الخصم المباشر)
يمكنك تفعيل خدمة الخصم التلقائي من حسابك البنكي بحيث يتم خصم قيمة الفاتورة شهريًا بشكل تلقائي. يتم التسجيل لهذه الخدمة عبر الموقع الإلكتروني أو التطبيق أو من خلال البنك الشريك
2
.
3. الدفع عبر مراكز خدمة العملاء
زيارة أحد فروع شركة أبوظبي للتوزيع المنتشرة في أنحاء الإمارة، حيث يمكنك دفع الفاتورة نقدًا أو عبر بطاقات الدفع
2
.
4. الدفع عبر محلات الصرافة والسوبرماركت
يمكنك دفع الفاتورة في بعض محلات الصرافة المعتمدة (مثل لولو للصرافة، الأنصاري للصرافة، لاري للصرافة، الفردان للصرافة) أو في بعض السوبرماركت المرتبطة بالخدمة
2
.
5. بوابة حكومة أبوظبي الرقمية (تم)
يمكنك دفع الفاتورة من خلال بوابة "تم" الإلكترونية، والتي تتيح خدمات دفع الفواتير الحكومية بسهولة
1
.
6. الهاتف أو مركز الاتصال
الاتصال بمركز خدمة العملاء على الرقم 8002332 واتباع التعليمات لدفع الفاتورة عبر الهاتف باستخدام بطاقة الائتمان
2
.
ملخص سريع (جدول)
طريقة الدفع
القناة/الموقع
ملاحظات
الموقع الإلكتروني
www.addc.ae

2025-10-05 12:25:45Where can I renew my residence visa in Dubai?You can renew your residence visa in Dubai by submitting your application and required documents through the GDRFA website or authorized typing center.Where to Renew Your Residence Visa in Dubai
You can renew your Dubai residence visa through several official channels. Here are your main options:
1. Online Platforms
GDRFA Dubai Website: You can apply for renewal directly through the General Directorate of Residency and Foreigners Affairs (GDRFA) Dubai official website
1
.
GDRFA Dubai Smart App: Download the GDRFADUBAI app on your smartphone to complete the process digitally
2
.
DubaiNow App: This app also allows you to renew your residency visa online
2
.
2. In-Person Service Centers
Amer Centers: These are authorized government service centers located throughout Dubai. You can visit any Amer Center to renew your residence visa. Some Amer Centers, such as Amer247 in Deira, operate 24 hours a day for your convenience
3
4
.
Summary Table
Channel
How to Access
Notes
GDRFA Website
https://www.gdrfad.gov.ae
Online application
GDRFA Smart App
Download from app stores
Online application
DubaiNow App
Download from app stores

In-person, some open 24/7
Additional Tips
Prepare all required documents before starting the renewal process (passport, Emirates ID, medical test results, etc.)
5
.
For personalized assistance, Amer Centers have staff who can guide you through the process.
References
1
: GDRFA Dubai – Official Website
2
: GDRFA Dubai – Residency Renewal Channels
3
: Amer247 – 24/7 Amer Center in Deira
4
: Amer Centre Karama – Residency Renewal Services
5
: DAMAC – UAE Residence Visa Renewal Guide

Clicked on Login Using Credential Logged into U-Ask as (farrukh.mohsin@northbaysolutions.net/test) Entered 'What is the procedure to sponsor a family member in the UAE?' in chat input box Clicked 'Send' button Latest AI response: Step-by-Step Guide: Sponsoring a Family Member in the UAE Sponsoring a family member in the UAE is a structured process governed by clear requirements and procedures. Below is a comprehensive, step-by-step guide to help you navigate the process successfully. 1. Check Eligibility Requirements You must hold a valid UAE residence visa (either as an employee or employer). Minimum salary requirement: AED 4,000 per month, or AED 3,000 plus accommodation 1 2 3 4 . Both male and female residents can sponsor family members, but requirements may differ slightly for women sponsors 3 5 . You can sponsor your spouse, children (sons up to 25 years, unmarried daughters of any age), and in some cases, parents or stepchildren (with additional conditions) 1 3 4 5 . 2. Gather Required Documents The documents may vary depending on the relationship, but generally include: Sponsor’s passport and valid UAE residence visa Family member’s passport copies Passport-sized photos of family members Attested marriage certificate (for spouse sponsorship), translated into Arabic if necessary Attested birth certificates (for children) Proof of accommodation (Ejari/tenancy contract or title deed) Salary certificate or labor contract Recent bank statements Emirates ID of sponsor Medical insurance (mandatory for parents and recommended for others) No Objection Certificate (NOC) if required (e.g., for mothers sponsoring children)[^1 Entered 'How do I pay my Salik toll fees?' in chat input box Clicked 'Send' button Latest AI response: Step-by-Step Guide: Paying Your Salik Toll Fees in Dubai Salik is Dubai’s electronic toll collection system. When your vehicle passes through a Salik toll gate, the fee is automatically deducted from your prepaid Salik account balance—there’s no need to pay cash at the gate 1 2 . To ensure you always have sufficient balance and avoid fines, you must regularly recharge your Salik account. Here’s how you can pay or recharge your Salik toll fees: 1. Check Your Salik Account Balance Visit the official Salik website or use the Salik mobile app. Log in using your account number and PIN, or your vehicle plate and mobile number 1 4 . Your current balance and transaction history will be displayed. 2. Recharge Your Salik Account You can recharge your Salik account using several convenient methods: a. Salik Website or Mobile App Go to the Salik website or open the Salik app. Log in to your account. Select “Recharge Account.” Enter your payment details (Salik recharge card, credit/debit card, or other available options). Confirm the transaction 1 4 . b. SMS Recharge Send an SMS in the required format with your account details and recharge card number. Note: SMS recharges may incur a small service fee (e.g., 30 fils) 1 . c. RTA Dubai App Download and open the RTA Dubai app. Navigate to the Salik section. Enter your account details and recharge amount. Pay using your preferred payment method 5 . d. Bank ATMs and Online Banking Many UAE banks allow Salik recharges via ATMs or their online banking platforms. Select the “Salik Recharge” option and follow the prompts. e. Third-Party Apps (e.g., Payit) Use apps like Payit to recharge your Salik account online. Follow the app’s instructions to complete the payment 5 . f. Retail Outlets Purchase Salik recharge cards from petrol stations, supermarkets, or convenience stores. Use the code on the card to recharge via the website, app, or SMS 3 . 3. Set Up Automatic Payments (Optional) You can set up automatic top-ups through the Salik website or app to ensure your account never runs out of balance 4 . 4. Confirm Payment After recharging, check your account balance to ensure the payment was successful. Important Notes Always keep your Salik account topped up to avoid fines for insufficient balance. Each recharge method may have specific instructions or minor service fees. You can manage your account, add vehicles, and view transactions online or via the app 4 . References 1 : Salik Official – Recharge a Salik Account 2 : Salik Official – About Salik 3 : Dubizzle – Salik Recharge Dubai 4 : Salik Official – Home Page 5 : Payit – Step-by-Step Guide on How to Recharge Salik Pay Online If you need detailed instructions for a specific recharge method or encounter any issues, please specify, and I can provide tailored guidance. Sources Scroll bar is displayed when AI response overflows – Accessibility verified.
